data.title: Arnon Milchan
data.meta_description: #949 Arnon Milchan on the 2024 Billionaires - Arnon Milchan owns film and TV production company New Regency Enterprises. New Regency has produced hits
data.text:

Fox News Decision Desk Director Arnon Mishkin predicts a good night for Republicans—but Democrats could pull off some surprises.

The network will be using its new Fox News Voter Analysis tool to study how people are voting--and which candidate will ultimately prevail.

Benjamin Netanyahu’s Future Threatened After He Is Charged With Corruption

The Israeli Prime Minister is looking to secure his hold on the premiership, however his fortunes could change after Attorney General Avichai Mandelblit charged the 70-year-old on Thursday.

How Hollywood's Billionaires Fared At The 2016 Academy Awards

For some of Hollywood’s billionaires – none of whom received their own Oscar – it was still a very good night.

Leonardo DiCaprio Finally Wins An Oscar For Best Actor

Leonardo DiCaprio won an Oscar for 'The Revenant' (Photo credit: VALERIE MACON/AFP/Getty Images) With his fifth nomination, Leonardo DiCaprio has finally earned an Oscar for his role in The Revenant. The actor beat out competition from Bryan Cranston (Trumbo), Eddie Redmayne (The Danish Girl), Matt Damon (The Martian) and Michael Fassbender (Steve [...]

Angelina Jolie: Oscar Money Watch

Angelina Jolie may not be nominated for an Oscar this year, but her movie—Unbroken—is. To be clear, the film is nominated in three of the more technical categories: Sound Editing, Sound Mixing, and Cinematography. Still, these nominations are only a boon for the actress-turned-director, who will now sport even more [...]

Steve Carell: Oscar Money Watch

Steve Carell is up for his first Oscar at the 87th Annual Academy Awards, and may well bring home a golden statue for his role in Foxcatcher. Either way, expect him to continue to pull in millions every year--here’s a rundown on the data FORBES has collected on him recently.

Arnon Milchan: Oscar Money Watch

  Arnon Milchan's New Regency Productions made the critically-acclaimed Birdman, which is currently the odds-on favorite to win Best Picture. The quirky tale of a washed up actor's adventures is nominated for eight other Oscars, tying with Wes Anderson's The Grand Budapest Hotel for most Oscar nods. It's not his only horse in the race - [...]

A photo slide show of four very driven moguls that appear on the World's Billionaires list.
